Mike Nguyen

Tech Lead / Fullstack Dev, Auckland, NZ

Resume

About Me

Mike Nguyen is a fullstack dev cum tech lead, with experience delivering end-to-end solution via best practices of DDD, TDD, design patterns, DevOps and agile. His background in computer science, data analytics and leadership inform his mindful and effective approach to problem solving and teamwork.


Mike is fueled by his passion for creating value to others by bringing together right technology, right people and right skill to deliver superb high quality working code on timely manner in order to generate competitive edge for business. He considers himself a 'forever student' eager to stay tune with latest technologies through continued coursework and professional development.


His hunger for knowledge and determination has contributed to his success at MIMS, a leading medicinial information provider and publisher MNC, where hed led multi-millon-dollar projects: from developing new system, to migrating 10+ countries data into the new system, to providing customized data to both internal and external customers. Meanwhile, he vastly improved the productivity and engagement of his team by implementing devops, agile methods and weekly tech sharing session.


Mike is currently working as senior software consultant and is always interested in a challenge.

Experience

Solnet

Snr Software Consultant - July 2019 - Now

Work closely with clients as strategic partner to understand their business needs so I can design, deliver and support the right solutions to help them achieve their goals.

  • Actively involved and assisted on agile process and requirement work, that helps to reduce idle & wasting time spending on requirement clarification between developers and product team.
  • Designed and implemented scalable e-commerce solution that provides significant cost reduction for ERP clients in term of operation and maintenance.

SMBC Bank, Singapore

Snr Software Engineer / Solution Designer - December 2017 - July 2019

Designing and developing new development framework to digitalize the business workflow process across various business functions in the bank; mentoring software engineers on .NET and web development framework; guiding agile practice across project teams; and implementing DevOps transformation.

  • Developed reusable UI components and code generator to bootstrap the frontend development that enables rapid prototyping of new business requirements; achieved 80% reduction of time spent, from one month to one week; bringing visibility and clarity to business users and promoting consistency and standardization
  • Designed workflow processes and developed core modules for various new workflow systems
  • Designed and implemented the DevOps CI/CD to new and legacy code base; reducing time to release from more than a month to a few days

MIMS, Singapore

Tech Lead / Data Manager - December 2011 - Nov 2017

Designed, architected and implemented various .NET applications (WinForm and ASP.NET Web, API); standardized software development, data migration and operation processes; led data migration and transformation projects; mentored on software development, quality assurance, process improvement and agile methodology.

  • Developed reusable UI components and code generator to bootstrap the frontend development that enables rapid prototyping of new business requirements; achieved 80% reduction of time spent, from one month to one week; bringing visibility and clarity to business users and promoting consistency and standardization
  • Designed and implemented the solution of alternative key matching API service used by all data production applications to ensure data integrity across all digital products (web, mobile, desktop)
  • Executed data migration projects achieving approximate 95% of data coverage of 10 Asia Pacific countriesâ€™ drug information that enabled successful transformation of new centralized Content Management (CMS) and data production processes
  • Designed data structure using MSSQL database, Domain Driven Design, ERM and implemented the C# ASP.NET application to successfully integrate data from legacy systems to roll out new e-MIMS Australia system delivered 1 million USD in revenue
  • Built and operationalized agile practice on continuous integration via Jenkins/MS Build, SVN, Slack, and JIRAs in cross server environment to accomplish 99.99% uptime of numerous IT applications in Production environment and increase test coverage of 70% for new development
  • Revamped the MIMS Reporting Module by analysing and assessing available frameworks (including Telerik, DevExpress and Infragistic) to develop new re-useable solution that enabled the roll out of more than 50 dynamic complex reports used intensively by healthcare professionals and business users across more than 10 countries
